headline: Reported Earlier, Verisk Analytics Prices $1B Senior Notes Offering With $500M 4.450% Notes Due 2031 And $500M 5.125% Notes Due 2036
summary: Reported Earlier, Verisk Analytics Prices $1B Senior Notes Offering With $500M 4.450% Notes Due 2031 And $500M 5.125% Notes Due 2036

raw.headline: Reported Earlier, Verisk Analytics Prices $1B Senior Notes Offering With $500M 4.450% Notes Due 2031 And $500M 5.125% Notes Due 2036

headline: Verisk Analytics, Inc. Prices Offering of Senior Notes
summary: JERSEY CITY, N.J., Feb. 23, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk Analytics, Inc. (Nasdaq: VRSK) (“Verisk” or the “Company”), a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, today announced the pricing of an offering of $500 million of 4.450% Senior Notes due 2031 (the “2031 Notes”) and $500 million of 5.125% Senior Notes due 2036 (the “2036 Notes” and, together with the 2031 Notes, the “Notes”). The closing of the offering is expected to occur on February 2

raw.headline: Verisk Analytics, Inc. Prices Offering of Senior Notes
raw.summary: JERSEY CITY, N.J., Feb. 23, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verisk Analytics, Inc. (Nasdaq: VRSK) (“Verisk” or the “Company”), a leading strategic data analytics and technology partner to the global insurance industry, today announced the pricing of an offering of $500 million of 4.450% Senior Notes due 2031 (the “2031 Notes”) and $500 million of 5.125% Senior Notes due 2036 (the “2036 Notes” and, together with the 2031 Notes, the “Notes”). The closing of the offering is expected to occur on February 2
